go_to_point.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #! /usr/bin/env python
2 
3 """!
4 
5 @file go_to_point.py
6 <div><b>ROS Node Name</b>
7  <ul><li>go_to_point</li></ul></div>
8 @brief Implementation of the movement action.
9 
10 @authors Carmine Tommaso Recchiuto, Francesco Ganci (S4143910)
11 @version v1.0
12 
13 <b>Description:</b> <br>
14 <p>
15 This node moves the robot towards a given target (position+orientation)
16 using a simple state machine. It is implemented as a ROS action.
17 </p>
18 
19 <b>Publishers:</b> <br>
20 <ul>
21  <li>
22  <i>/cmd_vel</i> : Twist <br>
23  The node can send a twist to the simulator through this topic. <br><br>
24  </li>
25 </ul>
26 
27 <b>Subscribers:</b> <br>
28 <ul>
29  <li>
30  <i>/odom</i> : Odometry <br><br>
31  </li>
32 </ul>
33 
34 <b>Providing actions</b> <br>
35 <ul>
36  <li>
37  <i>go_to_point</i> : GoToPoint.action <br>
38  Move the robot towards a given target pose. The node manages
39  a planar pose.
40  </li>
41 </ul>
42 
43 <b>TODOs</b><br>
44 @todo put more comments and tidy up the code
45 
46 """
47 
48 import rospy
49 from geometry_msgs.msg import Twist, Point
50 from nav_msgs.msg import Odometry
51 from tf import transformations
52 from rt2_assignment1.srv import Position
53 import math
54 import actionlib
55 from rt2_assignment1.msg import GoToPointAction, GoToPointGoal, GoToPointResult, GoToPointFeedback
56 
57 # robot state variables
58 position_ = Point()
59 yaw_ = 0
60 position_ = 0
61 state_ = 0
62 pub_ = None
63 
64 # parameters for control
65 yaw_precision_ = math.pi / 9 # +/- 20 degree allowed
66 yaw_precision_2_ = math.pi / 90 # +/- 2 degree allowed
67 dist_precision_ = 0.1
68 kp_a = -3.0
69 kp_d = 0.2
70 ub_a = 0.6
71 lb_a = -0.5
72 ub_d = 0.6
73 
74 def clbk_odom(msg):
75  global position_
76  global yaw_
77 
78  # position
79  position_ = msg.pose.pose.position
80 
81  # yaw
82  quaternion = (
83  msg.pose.pose.orientation.x,
84  msg.pose.pose.orientation.y,
85  msg.pose.pose.orientation.z,
86  msg.pose.pose.orientation.w)
87  euler = transformations.euler_from_quaternion(quaternion)
88  yaw_ = euler[2]
89 
90 
91 def change_state(state):
92  global state_
93  state_ = state
94  # print ('State changed to [%s]' % state_)
95 
96 
97 def normalize_angle(angle):
98  if(math.fabs(angle) > math.pi):
99  angle = angle - (2 * math.pi * angle) / (math.fabs(angle))
100  return angle
101 
102 
103 def fix_yaw(des_pos):
104  desired_yaw = math.atan2(des_pos.y - position_.y, des_pos.x - position_.x)
105  err_yaw = normalize_angle(desired_yaw - yaw_)
106  # rospy.loginfo(err_yaw)
107  twist_msg = Twist()
108  if math.fabs(err_yaw) > yaw_precision_2_:
109  twist_msg.angular.z = kp_a*err_yaw
110  if twist_msg.angular.z > ub_a:
111  twist_msg.angular.z = ub_a
112  elif twist_msg.angular.z < lb_a:
113  twist_msg.angular.z = lb_a
114  pub_.publish(twist_msg)
115  # state change conditions
116  if math.fabs(err_yaw) <= yaw_precision_2_:
117  #print ('Yaw error: [%s]' % err_yaw)
118  change_state(1)
119 
120 
121 def go_straight_ahead(des_pos):
122  desired_yaw = math.atan2(des_pos.y - position_.y, des_pos.x - position_.x)
123  err_yaw = desired_yaw - yaw_
124  err_pos = math.sqrt(pow(des_pos.y - position_.y, 2) +
125  pow(des_pos.x - position_.x, 2))
126  err_yaw = normalize_angle(desired_yaw - yaw_)
127  # rospy.loginfo(err_yaw)
128 
129  if err_pos > dist_precision_:
130  twist_msg = Twist()
131  twist_msg.linear.x = 0.3
132  if twist_msg.linear.x > ub_d:
133  twist_msg.linear.x = ub_d
134 
135  twist_msg.angular.z = kp_a*err_yaw
136  pub_.publish(twist_msg)
137  else: # state change conditions
138  #print ('Position error: [%s]' % err_pos)
139  change_state(2)
140 
141  # state change conditions
142  if math.fabs(err_yaw) > yaw_precision_:
143  #print ('Yaw error: [%s]' % err_yaw)
144  change_state(0)
145 
146 
147 def fix_final_yaw(des_yaw):
148  err_yaw = normalize_angle(des_yaw - yaw_)
149  # rospy.loginfo(err_yaw)
150  twist_msg = Twist()
151  if math.fabs(err_yaw) > yaw_precision_2_:
152  twist_msg.angular.z = kp_a*err_yaw
153  if twist_msg.angular.z > ub_a:
154  twist_msg.angular.z = ub_a
155  elif twist_msg.angular.z < lb_a:
156  twist_msg.angular.z = lb_a
157  pub_.publish(twist_msg)
158  # state change conditions
159  if math.fabs(err_yaw) <= yaw_precision_2_:
160  #print ('Yaw error: [%s]' % err_yaw)
161  change_state(3)
162 
163 
164 def done():
165  twist_msg = Twist()
166  twist_msg.linear.x = 0
167  twist_msg.angular.z = 0
168  pub_.publish(twist_msg)
169 
170 
171 
172 class GoToPointActionCLass:
173  def __init__( self ):
174  self.as_ = actionlib.SimpleActionServer( "go_to_point", GoToPointAction, execute_cb=self.goToPoint, auto_start=False )
175  self.fb = GoToPointFeedback( )
176  self.as_.start( )
177  #rospy.loginfo( "go_to_point action started" )
178 
179 
180  def goToPoint( self, goal ):
181  # get the desired pose
182  desired_position = Point( )
183  desired_position.x = goal.x
184  desired_position.y = goal.y
185  des_yaw = goal.theta
186  rospy.loginfo( "[go_to_point] goal: (%f, %f, %f)", goal.x, goal.y, goal.theta )
187 
188  success = True
189  change_state(0)
190 
191  time_before = rospy.Time.now().to_nsec()
192  time_now = -1
193  self.fb.progressTime = 0
194  self.fb.status = 0
195 
196  # it could not work because of a slow reading to the topic /odom
197  max_distance = math.sqrt( ( position_.x - desired_position.x )**2 + ( position_.y - desired_position.y )**2 )
198 
199  while True:
200  # check for any incoming cancellation request
201  if self.as_.is_preempt_requested( ):
202  rospy.loginfo( "CANCELLATION REQUEST RECEIVED." )
203  self.as_.set_preempted( )
204  success = False
205  done( )
206  change_state( 3 )
207  break;
208 
209  # state machine
210  if state_ == 0:
211  fix_yaw(desired_position)
212  elif state_ == 1:
213  go_straight_ahead(desired_position)
214  elif state_ == 2:
215  fix_final_yaw(des_yaw)
216  elif state_ == 3:
217  done()
218  break
219 
220  time_now = rospy.Time.now().to_nsec()
221 
222  # send the feedback
223  self.fb.status = state_
224  self.fb.actualX = position_.x
225  self.fb.actualY = position_.y
226  self.fb.actualTheta = yaw_
227  self.fb.distance = math.sqrt( ( position_.x - desired_position.x )**2 + ( position_.y - desired_position.y )**2 )
228  self.fb.progress = 1 - self.fb.distance / max_distance
229  self.fb.progressTime = self.fb.progressTime + (time_now - time_before)
230  time_prev = time_now
231  self.as_.publish_feedback( self.fb )
232  # rospy.loginfo( "[go_to_point] searching ... time: %f, progress: %f%%", self.fb.progressTime, self.fb.progress*100 )
233 
234  if success:
235  # the target has been reached
236  # publish the result
237  res = GoToPointResult( )
238  res.ok = True
239  self.as_.set_succeeded( res )
240  rospy.loginfo( "[go_to_point] SUCCESS in %f ms", self.fb.progressTime )
241 
242 
243 def main():
244  global pub_
245  rospy.init_node('go_to_point')
246  pub_ = rospy.Publisher('/cmd_vel', Twist, queue_size=1)
247  sub_odom = rospy.Subscriber('/odom', Odometry, clbk_odom)
248  act = GoToPointActionCLass( )
249  rospy.loginfo( "go_to_point ONLINE" )
250  rospy.spin()
251 
252 
253 if __name__ == '__main__':
254  main()
